name: I <3 Literature Postcard #3
description:
Make it clear that when civilization crumbles, you'll have a shotgun AND your undying love. This postcard lets that object of your affection know just how big a role they play in your life: you've already factored them in to hypothetical, post-apocalyptic scenarios.

Now that's commitment.

name: I <3 Literature Postcard #2
description:
If she sent you a postcard for Valentine's Day, it would say this. Maybe.

(Actually, if she'd written you a postcard, you'd have no idea how to interpret it the first 5 times you'd read it. You would have pretended you'd totally gotten it. Of course, to her it would have been both obvious and hilarious.

True story.)

name: I <3 Literature Postcard #1
description:
And he means that sincerely. With his extensive archive of published works, you can bet that's saying a lot. That special person in your life will have no doubt as to the depth of your affections when they find this in the mailbox.

Unless they have no idea who that is, in which case it'll just be awkward.
